recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: A simple Roman pasta dish with egg, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry pancetta in a pan until crispy.
Whisk eggs with grated parmesan and black pepper in a bowl.
Drain pasta, reserving some cooking water.
Mix pasta with pancetta, then remove from heat and stir in egg mixture, adding reserved water if needed.
Serve immediately with extra parmesan and pepper.

recipes.name: Classic Cheeseburger
recipes.description: Juicy beef burger with cheddar cheese on a toasted bun.
instructions: Preheat grill or skillet to medium-high heat.
Season beef patty with salt and pepper, then grill for 3-4 minutes per side.
Place cheddar cheese on patty during the last minute of cooking.
Toast hamburger bun on the grill.
Assemble burger with lettuce, tomato, pickles, ketchup, and mustard.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: French Omelette
instructions: Whisk eggs with a pinch of salt and pepper until smooth.
Melt butter in a non-stick skillet over medium-low heat.
Pour eggs into the skillet and stir gently with a spatula.
Cook until the edges set but the center is still soft.
Fold omelette in half and slide onto a plate.
Garnish with fresh herbs if desired.

recipes.name: Avocado Toast
recipes.description: Simple and healthy toast with mashed avocado.
instructions: Toast sourdough bread until golden.
Mash avocado with a fork and mix with a squeeze of lemon juice.
Spread avocado mixture on toasted bread.
Sprinkle with salt, black pepper, and chili flakes if using.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Miso Soup
recipes.description: Traditional Japanese soup with tofu, seaweed, and miso paste.
instructions: Heat dashi stock in a pot until simmering.
Add wakame seaweed and simmer for 1 minute.
Add cubed tofu and cook for another minute.
Dissolve miso paste in a small amount of hot stock, then stir into the pot.
Add chopped green onions and remove from heat.
Serve hot.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
recipes.description: Soft corn tortillas filled with seasoned ground beef.
instructions: Cook ground beef in a skillet over medium heat until browned.
Add taco seasoning and water as per packet instructions, then simmer.
Warm corn tortillas in a dry skillet or microwave.
Spoon beef mixture onto tortillas.
Top with lettuce, sour cream, cheese, and salsa.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Tomato Basil Soup
recipes.description: Creamy soup made with ripe tomatoes and fresh basil.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pot and saut√© chopped onion and garlic until soft.
Add chopped tomatoes and cook until they break down.
Pour in vegetable broth and simmer for 20 minutes.
Blend soup until smooth using an immersion blender.
Stir in chopped basil, salt, and pepper.
Serve hot with extra basil on top.

recipes.name: Shrimp Fried Rice
recipes.description: Stir-fried rice with shrimp, vegetables, and soy sauce.
instructions: Heat oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Add shrimp and cook until pink, then remove from skillet.
Scramble eggs in the skillet and set aside.
Add peas, carrots, and green onions, stir-frying until tender.
Add rice and soy sauce, stirring to combine.
Return shrimp and eggs to the skillet, mix well, and serve.

recipes.name: Caprese Salad
recipes.description: Italian salad with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.
instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella into even slices.
Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices alternately on a plate.
Tuck fresh basil leaves between the slices.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze, if using.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Chicken Teriyaki
recipes.description: Japanese-style grilled chicken glazed with sweet soy-based sauce.
instructions: Mix soy sauce, mirin, sake, and sugar to make the teriyaki sauce.
Marinate chicken thighs in half the sauce for 10 minutes.
Heat a skillet over medium heat and cook chicken skin-side down until golden.
Flip chicken and add remaining sauce, cooking until sauce thickens.
Slice chicken and drizzle with sauce.
Serve with rice or vegetables.
